extendedInfo.description: Supply Chain China is a news RSS fed mobile app that explores management and technology based solutions that help Chinese businesses improve the way they source, make, store, ship, deliver and ultimately recycle their products. It covers the physical supply chain but also the critical information and finance chains, and not neglecting the human resources aspects. The emphasis is on real-life, transferable practice and bottom-line improvement. Our content is designed to be of relevance to Chinese supply chain professionals managing procurement, production, warehousing and logistics, across the full range of Chinese manufacturing, retailing, service and public sectors but recognizing the truly global dimensions of many supply chains.
